parameters.name: VDir_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the V direction

parameters.name: VDir_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the V direction

parameters.name: VDir_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the V direction

title: IRenderMaterial.SetVDirection2
description: Sets the V direction of the texture-based appearance.
signature:
void SetVDirection2( 
   System.Double
VDir_X
,
   System.Double
VDir_Y
,
   System.Double
VDir_Z
)

parameters.name: VDir_X
parameters.description: X coordinate of the V direction

parameters.name: VDir_Y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the V direction

parameters.name: VDir_Z
parameters.description: Z coordinate of the V direction

remarks:
To specify the V direction in the Y direction, set:
VDir_X to 0.0.
VDir_Y to 1.0.
VDir_Z to 0.0.
The
mapping type
(surface, projection, automatic, etc.) indirectly determines the V direction. This vector is perpendicular to the U direction.
Call
IRenderMaterial::SetUDirection2
to set the U direction.
